column4: hi - i'm going a dist-upgrade from the command line and I'm seeing a lot of "Selecting previously deselected..." and "Unpacking x (from ..." and no mention of installing anything - is this something to be concerned about?
all i want is my machine to server hd content to my new tv through xbmc
ok, I'm also resorting to the slightly extreme measure of upgrading 6.10 -> 8.04 by just changing the apt sources file so when this does break I just want to make sure it's my fault :)
